x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Checklist is not available on work orders created by rounds, scheduled maintenance.
Steps to Execute:
Create a round with a pre-checklist and no working checklist.
Create the stops and execute the rounds.
Navigate to the newly created work order.
Expected Result: User should see the pre checklist button.
Actual Result: Pre checklist button not available on the work order created by rounds.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Checklist not available
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation:
There is an Update Set provided by the Product team to Fix this issue.
Apply Update Set : ChecklistRulesFix

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_d9a062d4db611d105f598b0505961910
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Checklist is not available on work orders created by rounds, scheduled maintenance.

Steps to Execute:

Create a round with a pre-checklist and no working checklist.

Create the stops and execute the rounds.

Navigate to the newly created work order.

Expected Result:
User should see the pre checklist button.

Actual Result:
Pre checklist button not available on the work order created by rounds.</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Checklist not available</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>There is an Update Set provided by the Product team to Fix this issue. 

Apply Update Set  :  ChecklistRulesFix
</remediation><script><![CDATA[//Bug : MM-8253

var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var updSet = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
updSet.addEncodedQuery('nameLIKEChecklistRulesFix');
updSet.query();

if (updSet.next()) {
    util.handleOutput('Work orders created by a work rounds stop will NOT have a checklist applied to it unless the checklist is directly set on the stop record itself. However, if a stop had those checklist fields left empty, and then a stand-alone checklist rule was created for Work Order Type = Rounding, once the stop generates the WO, it would NOT have the checklist applied to it, even though it matched the condition set on the stand-alone rule.', 'information', 'Facilities Maintenance');

} else {
    util.handleOutput('If there should be a checklist based on the work order rules but theres not, please apply Update Set "ChecklistRulesFix" to fix the issue. (MM-8253)', 'Warning', 'Facilities Maintenance');
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Apurva.Saxena@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-22 11:50:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>d9a062d4db611d105f598b0505961910</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Checklist not available</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_d9a062d4db611d105f598b0505961910</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:28</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
